channel.title: Page-rsses on Hugo Starter Project
channel.description: Recent content in Page-rsses on Hugo Starter Project

item.title: Sample Product 1
item.description:
Here is a content page, but using html. This is how we could build custom product pages.

This content and metadata of this project page is stored within 'content/page/products.html'

The layout/frame for this page is stored within 'layouts/page/products.html'

We can use this same frame for all of the product pages

Our Product is the best

Imagine fancy html/css/javascript things here
